name: Kuba
description: I'm Kuba, a 19 year old computer science student at TU Dublin. My interests include cybersecurity and cryptography. I've been learning computer science since high school where I received an award for the year's best computer science student. In my free time I enjoy hiking, photography and skiing.
p1-description: A website about me made using next.js
contact-paragraph: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. If you have any questions, I'll try my best to get back to you as soon as possible!
